name: CurrenciesWp
author: Dnolbon

sections.description:
Automatically download and show currency rate between two currencies from various banks.

Available bank list

  • Национальный Банк Республики Беларусь (Belarus central bank)
  • Eesti Pank (Estonian central bank)
  • European Central Bank
  • Lietuvos bankas (EU) (Lithuanian central bank, european rates)
  • Lietuvos bankas (LT) (Lithuanian central bank)
  • Latvijas banka (Latvian central bank)
  • Центральный банк Российской Федерации (Russian central bank)
  • ПриватБанк (Ukrainian PrivatBank)

Usage

[currencieconvert from=USD to=EUR]

[currencieconvert from=USD to=EUR decimals=4]
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin files to the plugin (commonly /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name) directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Choose your bank from CurrenciesWp->Settings in admin panel

Usage

[currencieconvert from=USD to=EUR]

[currencieconvert from=USD to=EUR decimals=4]
sections.faq:
I miss some banks, can you add them?

Just contact me over email support [@] dnolbon.com, or fill a form here https://dnolbon.com/contacts/
